interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Shakira Perfumes - Dance for Women - Long Lasting - Femenine, Charming and Modern Perfume - Fruity Floral Notes - Ideal for Day Wear - 1.7 Fl Oz
Review Date: 2021/10/18
Store: Shakira
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Shakira', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Item Volume': '50 Milliliters', 'Scent': 'Dance', 'Special Feature': 'Long Lasting', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Language': 'English', 'Product Dimensions': '2.64 x 2.05 x 5.63 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'Item model number': '8411061823033'}
Review Text: I love the bottle and the scent lasts all day. It is a sweet smell, but not floral. It has a clean smell and is very Feminine. The price is good. I like the scent, but it's not the exact scent I desire. Every time I fall in love with a new perfume.
Review Title: Long lasting fragrance
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

SIMPEXPE Spray Bottles Fine Mister, Refillable Cosmetic Containers for Cleaning 6.8 oz SIMPEXPE {'Brand': 'SIMPEXPE', 'Material': 'Plastic', 'Capacity': '200 Milliliters', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '7.3 x 2.4 x 2.2 inches', 'Product Dimensions': '7.3 x 2.4 x 2.2 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '761344588684'} Package includes: 2 spray bottles
This 7oz spray bottle has an adjustable nozzle and translucent bottle to easily see liquid levels. It can be used for a variety of home and garden application. Looks neat but small Eyeshadow Makeup Palette Matte Shimmer Glitter Eyeshadow Pallet High Pigmented Long Lasting Professional Metallic Eye Shadows Waterproof Make-Up 35 Colors (01) SACE LADY {'Brand': 'SACE LADY', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Special Feature': 'Waterproof, Matte, Long lasting', 'Product Benefits': 'Long Lasting', 'Product Dimensions': '7.95 x 4.09 x 0.47 inches; 0.04 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'AMZ-SL326'} I love the colors! and the pigment is amazing. it is super smooth and blends really well! I was happy to see it didn't break in shipping and was packaged well. I actually really like the pallet case its simple. Nice pallets! Keratin Secrets Do It Yourself Home Keratin System Keratin Secrets {'Package Dimensions': '8.27 x 4.21 x 3.9 inches; 2.87 Pounds'} Keratin’s make the hair smoother (NOT STRAIGHT), shinier, and frizzy free for up to 8 months depending on the strength of the product. Keratin treatments rebound the keratin in your hair so that they are all put back into place. There are a lot of steps but don’t get discouraged because they’re quiet simple. To start of give 2 good shampoos with a clarifying shampoo (specifically the keratin complex one, then towel dry and blow dry the unconditioned hair. Once fully dry, make small sections and apply the treatment from roots to ends and comb through with a fine tooth comb to make sure hair is fully saturated. Let that sit for 30 minutes then blow dry again without washing out the product. Once fully dry the final step will be to straighten the hair with a flatiron so the keratin will set in your hair. After you’re completely done you won’t be able to wash your hair for up to 3 days depending on the strength in the solution. Smooth long curls Magnetic Eyelashes With Eyeliner Kit,10 Pairs Eyelashes Magnetic 2021 Upgraded 3D Fluffy Natural Waterproof Reusable Fox Eyes Kit False Eyelashes And Eyeliner. Alyxxndra {'Color': 'Black', 'Brand': 'Alyxxndra', 'Material': 'Faux Mink', 'Material Feature': 'Disposable', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Package Dimensions': '9.21 x 6.1 x 0.71 inches; 2.89 Ounces', 'UPC': '788402874992', 'Manufacturer': 'Alyxxndra'} I like this pen I wish it worked a little better though. I have the liquid one as well and I feel that that one holds the mascara a little more but it is stickier so I really wanted the pen to work especially for the wing. But overall, I love the liner and the lashes so much easier than trying to mess with glue. Thank you for your products they arRead more about the review stating Liner and lashes a total game-changer. Love it IPL Hair Removal | Laser Hair Removal For Women - Upgraded 999,999 Flashes with 2 Flash Windows, Permanent Hair Removal For Legs, Arms, Underarm, Face,Bikini Line,Chest. (white& golden) Gift (white) MELUN {'Brand': 'MELUN', 'Power Source': 'Battery Powered', 'Included Components': 'Charger', 'Head Type': 'Foil', 'Number of Blades': '2', 'Package Dimensions': '8.6 x 7.5 x 3.1 inches; 1.45 Pounds', 'UPC': '653846877987'} It arrived as described with two shielding glasses and a razor. The product itself is easy to use and the buttons on it are easy to figure out and operate. I got this product a few weeks ago so it's still too early to tell about its efficacy (which is why I gave it 4 stars but will update a few months from now when results can be actually measured). There are a few things I've already noticed however, on the sections where I've been using it the hair seems to be growing a bit thinner and taking also a bit longer to grow back. I'm comparing results by leaving a patch next to the area I'm treating alone and seeing how fast they both grow, the treated area seems to be lagging behind by a couple of days. We'll see what happens in a few months after which I will update. Works well - have to be consistent. Hair Removal for Women and Men - IPL Permanent Hair Remover Technology - 999,999 Flashes Automatic Hair Remover for Face, Arms, Legs, Bikini Area and Whole Body UNIWA {'Product Dimensions': '7.8 x 2.5 x 1.57 inches; 1.32 Pounds', 'Manufacturer': 'cwell'} I’ve been using this for a little over three months. I use it maybe every two to three days on my face, underarms and bikini area. The hair on my bikini area grows in slower so I figured in a few more months it should be nonexistent. Underarm hair still grows in the same amount and texture. It might require longer use. I had stray hairs on my jawline that would cause ingrown hairs and then hyperpigmentation from the scar. The main ones are gone!! The thicker ones I should say. Definitely have noticed a difference on my face. It’s worth a shot- it’s cheaper than going to a salon and it’s a quick process to treat the areas. Just don’t use the razor that comes in the box. It’s very rough and won’t remove the hair. After 3 months of use can slightly see results Shakira Perfumes - Dance for Women - Long Lasting - Femenine, Charming and Modern Perfume - Fruity Floral Notes - Ideal for Day Wear - 1.7 Fl Oz Shakira {'Brand': 'Shakira', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Item Volume': '50 Milliliters', 'Scent': 'Dance', 'Special Feature': 'Long Lasting', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Language': 'English', 'Product Dimensions': '2.64 x 2.05 x 5.63 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'Item model number': '8411061823033'} I love the bottle and the scent lasts all day. It is a sweet smell, but not floral. It has a clean smell and is very Feminine. The price is good. I like the scent, but it's not the exact scent I desire. Every time I fall in love with a new perfume. Long lasting fragrance
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** The user continues to explore innovative personal care solutions, now expanding their interests to include captivating fragrances that embody femininity and modern charm, indicating a desire for products that enhance personal expression.

- **Capacity Preference:** They maintain a preference for moderately sized beauty products that deliver effective results without contributing unnecessary bulk.

- **Quality Awareness:** The user demonstrates a discerning approach to product effectiveness and usability, reflecting in their evaluations of fragrances, where they assess both the initial impression and lasting qualities.

- **Versatility:** A strong inclination towards multipurpose items remains evident, as the user seeks products that serve various purposes while offering delightful sensory experiences.

- **Material Preference:** Consistently favors lightweight materials, aligning with their choices in both personal care and beauty products, ensuring ease of use.

- **Review Engagement:** Actively participates in community feedback by providing thoughtful reviews that consider aesthetics and performance while tracking long-term satisfaction with new products.

- **Aesthetic Sensibility:** Continues to appreciate products that combine visual appeal with functional benefits, showing a preference for beautifully designed items.

- **Fragrance Exploration:** The recent interaction highlights the user’s interest in perfumes that balance sweet and clean notes, as well as their pursuit of fragrances that complement their style and personality.

In summary, the user seeks aesthetically pleasing, versatile, and effective products that resonate with their personal style while staying engaged in community discussions about quality and performance.
